name: Flux IT
description:
We are a tribe of devs, software architects, and product & UX designers ready to face any challenge in the digital world.
With 11+ years in the industry working for 70+ clients in LatAm and USA, our squads (180+ fluxers) have strong technical skills and domain over the latest programming languages and UX/UI trends and methodologies. We also have the ability to identify the real value behind every solution, with a strong thinking towards technology and business. 
Fluxers are ready to fit with your culture and embrace a sense of collaborative, flexible, creative and detail-oriented set of attitudes. Our global vision allows us to organically adapt to teams with different cultural backgrounds. 
We team up with you to make your team bigger, faster and stronger.
